riglogix from dhi group reuters staff

text: February 27, 2018 / 2:09 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Westwood Global Energy Group Says‍ Has Acquired RigLogix From DHI Group Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 27 (Reuters) - DHI Group Inc: * WESTWOOD GLOBAL ENERGY GROUP ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF RIGLOGIX - A PREMIUM OIL AND GAS DATA SERVICES PLATFORM * WESTWOOD GLOBAL ENERGY GROUP SAYS‍ HAS ACQUIRED RIGLOGIX FROM DHI GROUP, INC​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
